title: The Most Epic Drone Farm Tour | by Farmer Brad

tasks.task: Loading fresh produce onto a truck
subtasks: Approach the pile of freshly harvested vegetables
Slide the first basket onto the truck bed
Repeat for remaining baskets, ensuring they are stacked securely
Approach the group of horses at the pasture
Direct each horse into the trailer one by one
Secure each horse's halter and lead line
Untack the mule, removing previous work gear
Clean the mule's hooves and legs
Saddle the mule for the day's chores
Pick a suitable location for planting
Measure out rows for planting
Plant seeds at the correct depth and spacing
Walk through the vegetable patch, selecting ripe produce
Gather the ripe vegetables into baskets
Transport the baskets to the loading area
Collect feed for the pigs from the storage area
Walk to the pigsty, opening the entry gate
Feed the pigs, distributing the feed evenly
Approach a stall containing a horse
Remove bedding and manure, pile into a wheelbarrow
Clean the stall floors and walls
Refill hay and water for the horses
Approach the milking parlor
Attach milking equipment to the cow's udder
Commence milking, applying gentle pressure
Collect milk into a container, cleaning equipment after

tasks.task: Planting cover crops between rows of vegetables
subtasks: Drive a tractor through the rows, drop seed into the ground
Cover the seeds with a small amount of soil
Approach the cattle herd in the pasture
Observe each animal, checking for signs of illness or injury
Document any issues noticed and plan treatment

tasks.task: Driving a combine harvester in the field
subtasks: Sit in the operator's seat, engage the steering
Navigate the combine through the crop rows
Adjust cutting height and combine settings as needed
Walk through the irrigation pipes, identify potential blockages
Clear debris or dislodged valves, ensuring water flow

tasks.task: Mitigating flooding damage on the farm
subtasks: Survey the affected areas, assess the extent of water damage
Transfer livestock to higher ground, if necessary
Excavate trenches to alleviate standing water
Place sandbags along vulnerable areas to prevent further flooding

tasks.task: Building fences around the grazing area
subtasks: Measure and mark the perimeter for the fence
Drive posts into the ground, spacing appropriately
Attach wire or fencing material to the posts, stretch tightly
Visit the orchard, assess the maturity of fruit on trees
Taste samples from different trees, gauge ripeness
Select the appropriate pesticide and applicator
Mix the pesticide according to instructions
Evenly spray the solution onto the crops, covering thoroughly
Locate the damaged fence panel, determine cause
Remove the broken sections, store safely
Cut new material to fit the gap
Attach the new sections to the existing fence posts

tasks.task: Operating a backhoe to dig a small pond
subtasks: Position the backhoe on site, engage the digging bucket
Dig the pond to the desired depth and dimensions
Compact the soil around the pond to prevent settling

tasks.task: Fitting a new harness on a mule
subtasks: Unfasten the old harness, collect it
Examine the mule's gaits, check for any lameness
Select the appropriate harness size, ensure it fits properly
Secure the harness, tightening straps as needed
Lead the pigs from their pen to a designated area
Ensure all pigs are accounted for, none are left behind
Provide opportunities for pigs to explore and play
Use a planter machine attached to a tractor
Adjust the planter settings for proper seed depth
Drive the tractor in straight lines, planting corn seeds

tasks.task: Taking a young horse out in the pasture and acclimating to its surroundings
subtasks: Lead the horse from the stable to the pasture
Allow the horse time to explore, observe behavior
Ensure there are no hazards or distressing elements in the pasture

tasks.task: Preparing a dairy cow for milking
subtasks: Lead the cow to the milking parlor, secure in a stall
Clean the cow's udder and teats
Attach milking cups or squeeze cups

tasks.task: Regularly checking farm equipment to ensure proper functioning
subtasks: Inspect tractors and other vehicles for oil leaks, tire pressure
Lubricate moving parts, tighten loose connections
Test safety features, ensure they are operational

tasks.task: Transferring grain from combine to a storage bin
subtasks: Guide the combine to the grain unloader
Operate the auger or conveyor belt to transfer grain
Close the combine's unloading port once transfer is complete
